      • resetClient

        public static void resetClient(Host host)
        Resets the client so it has to re-read the settings and recreate the instance.
        Parameters:

      • createHttpClient

        private static HttpApi createHttpClient(INotifiableManager manager)
        Returns an instance of the HTTP Client. Instantiation takes place only once, otherwise the first instance is returned.
        Parameters:
        manager - Upper layer reference
        Returns:
        HTTP client

      • createEventClient

        private static IEventClient createEventClient(INotifiableManager manager)
        Returns an instance of the Event Server Client. Instantiation takes place only once, otherwise the first instance is returned.
        Parameters:
        manager - Upper layer reference
        Returns:
        Client for XBMC's Event Server
